column4: How to config JAVA's environment variable JAVA_HOME in ubuntu?
add a line in /etc/profile : JAVA_HOME = <path_to_java> ; export JAVA_HOME
edit Tomcat's startup script and just set JAVA_HOME in there...
yes, what mwe says....exit the current shell and start a new one to have it source /etc/profile, or do something like this from the prompt:  . /etc/profile
